forceLogin.title: Force Login
forceLogin.description: Require user to login by default while taking a quiz. Necessary for tracking users of a quiz. (Could be changed for each quiz)

loginPromptMessageOnQuizStart.title: 'On quiz start' Login prompt message
loginPromptMessageOnQuizStart.description: Message to be shown to the user asking for logging in on quiz start. (Leave it empty to use default message setting in 'Config' menu)

loginPromptMessageBeforeResult.title: 'Before result' Login prompt message
loginPromptMessageBeforeResult.description: Message to be shown to the user asking for logging in before viewing result. (Leave it empty to use default message setting in 'Config' menu)

showFacebookComments.title: Enable Facebook comments for quizzes?
showFacebookComments.description: Display Facebook comments box below quiz results after a user finishes a quiz

showSharePromptModal.title: Show share prompt modal
showSharePromptModal.description: Show share prompt modal after quiz result is shown to the user

showPageLikePrompt.title: Show page-like prompt
showPageLikePrompt.description: Show facebook page-like prompt below quiz result
